"Symbol that stands out?":
"As expected, I thought that the symbol is also
needed this year, and asked around. But somehow
there is a rumour that the Automata species known
as the Signogan's parts are also in this shape!
Please bring them along to liven up the atmostphere
of the party! Please do!

*Target Signogan"

"やっぱり今年もシンボルが必要かなって
色々と調べていたんだけど
どうやらシグノガンって機甲種のパーツの
一部がそれっぽい形をしてるって噂なの！

パーティを盛り上げる添え物として
是非とも持ってきて！　お願いっ！

※シグノガンが対象"
